item.title: 'Medicaid unwinding' can be dangerous for those who need opioid addiction medications
item.description: States overhauling Medicaid rolls have accidentally dropped eligible people from coverage, sometimes for months. That can be dangerous for those who need opioid addiction medications.

item.title: Extreme heat contributed to his brother’s death. He worries he could be next
item.description: Wilmer Vasquez died at just 29 years old after suffering heat illness during the hottest year on record. His brother, Yonatan, says climate change played a big role.

item.title: Iran overturns rapper Toomaj Salehi's death sentence for criticizing the government
item.description: The rapper came to fame over his lyrics about the death in police custody of Mahsa Amini in 2022. Iran's Supreme Court ruled the sentence was more than what is allowed by the law.
